website_summaries.verdict: A firm mattress that supports stomach and back sleepers well and can be turned and flipped to extend its usefulness.
pros: Unlike hybrid mattresses, this all-foam mattress can be flipped over for even wear and longer service life
Good firmness provides support for stomach sleepers
The mattress maintains its firmness through at least the first year
cons: Couples who sleep in different positions may disagree about the comfort level

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were in the market for a queen mattress to replace our older spring mattress. We opted for memory foam to try something different. I thought it would be much firmer, but it is a nice medium firmness. the mattress was well packaged,It decompressed in a few hours and was everything they said it would be. Great deal.We bought this mattress after staying at the hotel,Our hotel room had a great cool firm memory foam mattress. This one is definetly comparable to the mattress we slept on at the Hotel. This bed doesn't put pressure on my joints. It supports your body, and allows your muscles to relax. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: lesley

customer_reviews.title: The first night I slept on this mattress I slept ...
customer_reviews.text: The first night I slept on this mattress I slept so well I was 30 minutes late to work the next day!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Betty Larceny

customer_reviews.title: 💕💕I am so happy💕💕
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of comparison shopping before I bought this mattress. It arrived quickly and in perfect condition. No discernible odor. I started with the firm side and I was certain I’d like that best. After two nights, I flipped to the soft side and have never looked back. I tend to be overly warm at night but I have been more comfortable since I got my new mattress. As in much more comfortable. I love, Love, Love my new bed and feel like it was a terrific value. I would buy this again in a second. My only regret is waiting so long to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Punk Rock Patti

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick for me
customer_reviews.text: Turned out comfortable and perfect for me! It's not too plush and not too firm, just how I like it. Glad I didn't buy that 900 dollar one a week prior to finding this 😸😸
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Quality comfort and price best
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money for $3000+ Matress. This is the best memoryfoam matress. We use cool side medium soft side very comfortable. I am very glad to chose that matress
customer_reviews.author: A. AKTEN

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend memory mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable mattress, I did lots of research before ordering this one, and it doesn’t make me disappoint. It came with a nice packing and sealed with a vacuum bag which made it easy to move out and set up. 10 inch is really thick enough for me, and you can choose the firm side or the soft side according to your preference, to me the firm side is awesome, feels extremely comfortable, and relaxing, makes me sleeping like a baby, even i have back sore, it can help relieve the pain. Highly recommend, as well as the great value of the price.
customer_reviews.author: SHUAI

customer_reviews.title: It’s good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great bed Although like most reviews, it’s SO FIRM ! It says medium so I thought maybe it needed time to break in but it’s been 2 months and it’s still very very very firm! I love soft sink into beds, but my chiropractor -and I’m sure everyone else chriopractor tells us to sleep on firm beds. So here ya go. EDIT: it’s been 4 months with the bed and it has big slits in the memory foam now. You can feel them just laying in bed or sitting up with a cup of coffee your butt falls into this awkward crack.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am always very positive writing reviews but not this time. I am surprise how many good reviews this matress has, I dont understand why. We bought it one year ago and we've been sleeping very bad since then. We bought a matress topper to improve It, but It keeps being unconfortable! And this is not only me.. I sleep with my husband and he hates the matress as much as I do, we have pain every morning! Then It goes away, we got used to it 😅, but we are definetly selling it or throwing It away... Sorry for the bad review! But I hope It helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Plush Like a Cloud?
customer_reviews.text: "Plush like a cloud"? Well, not so much. This mattress is actually surprisingly quite firm (even on the softer top side). That is good for back sleepers and stomach sleepers, but less so for side sleepers. Still, a quality mattress for a very convenient price. I used the queen size on a Nomad Plus frame (narrow gap slats) and it worked fine--although the mattress is very slightly wider than the frame. I let the mattress come to life for a few days while I assembled the frame, then stained and poly coated it. No chemical smell at all from the mattress. Overall, quite happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Etienne

customer_reviews.title: Really? All 5 star?
customer_reviews.text: Really ? 165 all 5 stars? I had doubt until I tried for few nights.... and yes it is 5 star ! pro - one side is firm and other soft, it is nice to be able to choose your preference. (I like real firm, and it is firm enough for me) Does NOT collect body heat. My biggest problem with previous memory form mattress was the heat. but this one does not get hot. great packaging con? - after one week, nothing yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jon K, VA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this mattress due to raving reviews at Amazon site. I’ve chronic back and shoulder pain that have been bothering me for a mighty long time. I’ve seen numerous doctors and chiropractors. They couldn’t find anything wrong! It was really frustrating and frightening. Few weeks back one of my friends have similar problems told me to try this particular queen mattress for a try. I slept on the firm side exactly for one week now. Amazingly and miraculously the problems seem to get better. Last night I slept through the whole nightzzzzz.
customer_reviews.author: Amaxon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: We love this mattress. Downside is we have only owned it for one year and somehow the foam has a crack across the width of the mattress and it almost goes all the way through. Hoping the 10 year warranty on the mattresses will cover whatever is wrong with this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is the most unconfortable thing i have ever slept on.
customer_reviews.text: I had knee surgery and my husband bought this mattress thinking it would be the perfect thing to help me recover from my knee replacement surgery. I have not been able to sleep in a bed until this past week so the mattress was not used until four days ago. I had to sleep in a recliner up until now which is quite common for people who get new knees. The mattress is extremely hard and has some kind of a hump in the middle of it, I would tell anyone to avoid this mattress. I have no problem sleeping on any other mattress in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kalhoon58

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on cement
customer_reviews.text: After much research we recently bought this mattress for our new vacation home and found it to be miserably uncomfortable on both sides. We have a Novaform mattress (from Costco) and a Tempurpedic mattress at home, both of which are very comfortable, so we had higher expectations. It was a bit of hassle to return but the cost was fully covered thankfully. We opted to spend just a bit more for the Novaform mattress from Costco and are so glad we did! Would NOT recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: 4 weeks in and I regreted buying it; BUT, seller was awesome to work with.
customer_reviews.text: Have to change this to a 3.75. Manufacturer gave a full refund, no questions asked; so I don't regret trying it. Original review: really, really disappointed. It's a terrible buy, even for the price. My wife and I have been been sleeping on this mattress for a month now; and it already has permanent indentation marks where we sleep (and we're not heavy people). Both sides are basically the same too, so flipping it hasn't helped much.
customer_reviews.author: Backyard Traveler

customer_reviews.title: This queen mattress is even better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This queen mattress is even batter than expected! The mattress was delivered on time. I removed it from the box and cut it out of its plastic wrap. Within an hour the mattress inflated to normal size. There was no odor or chemical smell. I love this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Rong jiang

customer_reviews.title: Okay mattress, but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This mattress heats up quickly, and is very warm to sleep on. We do have it with the supposed cool gel side up, but after about 20 minutes of laying on it, it feels uncomfortably hot. If you lay on the 8 inches closest to either side, you roll off the edge. I think it would be fine for one person sleeping in the middle, but it is not for two people. EDIT: So still not thrilled with the mattress itself, but customer service is fantastic. I was offered a full refund, without having to return the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: received the bed when promised, opened the packaging and rolled bed onto our existing king box. No weird chemical smell. After sleeping in it for a few weeks I am happy with my purchase. I am sleeping so well. No longer wake up with a stiff shoulder. Very comfortable, firm yet soft. I'm a front/side sleeper and find the mattress just right.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P

customer_reviews.title: Thought I was getting a great deal! The firmness wasn’t as described
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting a great deal! The firmness wasn’t as described, The smell did not go away. The bed did not breathe coolness, but I thought I was getting a great deal. I realized you get what you pay for! Amazon was the reason for the 2 star. Customer service said full refund! Would not pickup. My options toss it, or give it always! I donated it to a shelter where it will be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: michael l rinella

customer_reviews.title: Best bed in a box I've had.
customer_reviews.text: Omg so much better than expected. This is my third mattress in a box and not the most expensive one but hands down the best. No chemical smell. Formed to shape in seconds and very sturdy yet soft.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Material
customer_reviews.text: Made with cheap materials. My back hurts each day when I wake up. It doesn’t cradle you at all. Just feels like you’re sleeping on low quality foam. I am in the process of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: After research ordered this one. First impression is very good!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress came on time and was a little skeptic! From my research and reviews of mattress in a box I have noticed the great problem that stood out was a lasting chemical smell and not airing out or rising to it full size. When I opened my family members and have not noticed any bad smell at all. There is a new product smell when opened it but it dissipated very quickly. Will see how it goes in the next couple of months on sleep quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Not my best purchase, too hard
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy. I have slept on this for over a week. Tried both sides and it is just too hard and I wake up in the middle of the night. I love a firm bed but this just isn't comfortable. I am going to run to Costco today to get a gel topper so I don't have to go through the hassle of trying to return it. However, for the price, I had to at least give it three stars. If the gel Topper fixes it then it isn't a bad economical solution. Update 2019, the Topper did not help like I thought it would. This mattress is still too hard and I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pnut41

customer_reviews.title: like me, are accustomed to a beautyrest pillow top
customer_reviews.text: if you, like me, are accustomed to a beautyrest pillow top, this will not fit the bill. this mattress is for people who like extremely firm sleeping quarters. so firm that there are gaps between you and the mattress on the firm side and need a topper to keep warm( I fortunately have one.) the soft side is a little better, but I have to say a week w/ this bed and you need the topper... I have a 2" gel memory foam that when put down on top of the soft side made FINALLY for a decent night sleep. they've got FIRM down, but forgot the cozy, soft topcoat. once you add that, it's doable.
customer_reviews.author: M.j.a.

customer_reviews.title: Should be branded “Nightmares”
customer_reviews.text: The worst Mattress I’ve ever imagined. We are a couple 160 and 120 lb. After sleeping on it for two weeks, the back pain has increased a lot on both of us. It is so soft, after 10 min on it you sunk all the way to the bed base. No support at all, no support from any kind. We were starting to feel fear every day when the time to go to bed comes, but the one you feel when you watch an excellent horror movie. Not even recommendable for a guest room unless you have horrible feelings about the person staying. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Facundo

customer_reviews.title: I have spent a lot of money trying to find mattress pads to make it more comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to this mattress... read reviews, had high hopes because of reviews.... not impressed. Way too hard.... I have spent a lot of money trying to find mattress pads to make it more comfortable... and honestly would have rather saved money to purchase a different mattress. Would return if I could. Was under the impression it was softer than it was. If you like extreme firm mattress. You would like this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sleep well
customer_reviews.text: Over all I am extremely pleased with this product. The shipment was quick and hassle free,and the packing was nice too. When we unboxed it the mattress was in a vacuum sealed bag which made it easy to move to the correct plac.once we opened the bag the mattress fluffed up very quickly even though the seller stated it may take longer to reture to its original form.we love the option that it is double sided meaning you can flip it multiple ways to extend the over all life of the mattress. Also one side is firm and one is soft. I am very pleased with this purchase and I would suggest this to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Khriszzz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't completely satisfied with the bed, but I will thankfully admit that Sweetnight was amazing to work with. They really took my comments to heart. Their customer service was exceptional and helped me find the right product to make the softness of the bed to fit my needs. I highly recommend purchasing from this company because, I bet, they will provide the same level of customer service to you.
customer_reviews.author: Bradlee Robbert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Company to work with
customer_reviews.text: The Mattress came in a box and it was easy enough to set up. The twin mattress is compressed and air packed tight and easy to cut open and pull out. The company reached out to me to make sure everything was going well. They worked with me to make it right. Thank you! I recommend this company to others.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews not paidTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable mattress I have ever slept on
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down THE best purchase I have ever made! I was a bit skeptical about buying a mattress online, but I am so glad that I did. After reading the reviews, I decided to give this mattress a try. It was so easy to unpack! We just opened it up and left it to expand for a couple of hours. It is firm, but you also sink into it nicely. It is the exact type of mattress my boyfriend and I were looking for! It is seriously the most comfortable mattress either of us has ever slept on. Worth every penny for the best sleep of your life
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Torres

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bed for about 10 days now. I will never go back to a pillow top or spring mattress. I love it!! It does have an odor when opened but give it the 72 hours like the instructions say (uncovered) and it goes away. I swear I don’t move at all at night, it is super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Seemed scammy but..
customer_reviews.text: I just put this up today, it’s sooo comfy! Like laying on a cloud! I was kind of hesitant on buying this after seeing some “scammy” type of reviews, but I am glad I did. It is for sure worth it at its price point. I’ll update the review later after sleeping on this for a few nights to see how it really goes, but overall a pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Justin Blanton

customer_reviews.title: So glad we purchased this mattress
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I recently moved and had to be without our mattresses or other furniture for several months. After quickly getting tired of the blow up mattress, I decided to take my chances on this mattress because of the great reviews, the fact that it comes in a box and the fact that it is relatively inexpensive. After several weeks, I notnonly dont regret the purchase, but I plan on using it as our mattress even when our other mattresses arrive. It is not over rated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like this memory foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this memory foam mattress, I really didn't expect it to be delivered in a large carton. You only need to use the included tool to easily open it completely. I am more used to sleeping hard The mattress is biased towards medium hardness, but the comfort of sleeping on it still feels more comfortable. The only shortcoming is that the smell is still a bit large after opening for 2 days. It is recommended to stay for a few days to use it is best Way!
customer_reviews.author: Hillko

customer_reviews.title: Dumpster fire of a mattress
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the worst mattress I've ever owned. I went through hours and hours of research to find something that would give me a comfortable night's sleep. After reading many reviews, and being drawn in by the affordability, I went with this one. Big mistake. No matter which side you sleep on, the result is the same. Incredibly hot, terrible back pain no matter what position you sleep in. Don't make the mistake I did. Go for a higher end mattress and just make monthly payments.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Conveniently delivered to my home, rolled into a more manageable box (rather than the standard mattress size box). I just placed it on top of my box springs. It took a couple of days to completely return from compression to its normal size. There was no bad odor. I forgot, at first, that one side is softer; lying down, I thought it was much too soft, but upon reading the instructions that came with it, I flipped it over ( which is easily done by one person) and now get good support from the preferred firmer side. It is also apparent that there are different levels of support in different areas. I am well satisfied with this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: best mattress ever
customer_reviews.text: I was very nervous about making decision because you really can’t tell if you’re going to like something by laying on it for 3 minutes in a store. Very nervous about buying a mattress online. After I read some reviews same brand , then decided to try it. I feel very comfortable and got good sleep every night. I would recommend anyone who has any doubt to just try it out. I think you will love it
customer_reviews.author: 。

customer_reviews.title: AVOID THIS PURCHASE IF YOU HAVE BACK PAIN
customer_reviews.text: I am a 27-year-old mother of three here to tell you that I am so upset about this mattress. My husband was convinced that this puppy would solve all of our concerns when it came to the subject of body pain. It was the exact opposite, sadly. The bed is just too firm for either side. The support that is needed for backs or hips is just nonexistent. I rely on my body as a stay at home mother. I felt so frustrated when I woke up barely able to make the damn bed. Please reconsider your options if you have severe body pain.
customer_reviews.author: Nude Gingrich

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We were hesitant about buying a bed online without being able to try it, but after reading the reviews we decided to go a head and give it a try. My husband and I are very pleased with this purchase! It was inexpensive compared to most, and i could pull it out of the box by myself. It does have an unpleasant odor at first, but goes away within a couple of days. it also came with a 30 day free trial. i have already recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Miller

customer_reviews.title: One of the best investments you can make for your back hips etc
customer_reviews.text: One of the best investments you can make for your back hips etc. Get the best night sleep you deserve. Throw in a 2" gel foam topper on top of the firm cushy blue side and your on a cloud. 😇 Yeah a little gas off for three days so what. You won't regret the amazing almost Zero Gravity feel as it mold to your changing positions. Customer care is responsive to any questions or concerns I had. You can't lose on a real winner.
customer_reviews.author: R Santi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is fantastic! It was super easy to get out of the box and open up. I let it sit and “fill” up in a spare bedroom for 24 hours, before putting it on our bed last night. I was amazed by how firm the firm side is (btw I love that it has two usable sides, with different softness/firmness!). My husband is super picky about mattresses but all morning he talked about how he had the best night of sleep last night! A lot of reviews mentioned it smell, but the smell really wasn’t that bad. I hardly smelt it at all after leaving it to air out in our spare bedroom for a day
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine & Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Very Comfortable, Supportive, Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, where do I start....? I have slept on a top brand memory foam mattress for years. So, it was time to buy our 6yr. old a new mattress. I did a lot of research and decided on the twin size 10” SweetNight reversible memory foam mattress and it was a great decision bc one side is actually very soft but supporting and the other side was firmer but still soft. We are using the softer side bc my skinny 6 year old needs the softer side and he loves his bed! I have taken naps on his bed and it felt awesome! I would recommend this mattress to everyone! Thank you very much SweetNight!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Not for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: Both sides of this mattress are firm. The "soft" side means you sink in slightly, but it is still firm. I tossed and turned all night trying to sleep on this. I am a side sleeper and kept waking up with my arms falling asleep because of the pressure from this mattress. This might be ok for someone who sleeps on their back. It also has an extremely strong chemical smell which didn't diminish several days after airing it out.
customer_reviews.author: jeeenk

customer_reviews.title: cozy bed
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit optimistic about this bed initially. Infact I did even try to cancel order, but couldn’t as it was too late. Once received, decided to try and see if it fits me. To my surprise it was good. I am not a Fan of memory foam mattress. It was a week since I used this mattress and I can already see my back is feeling better. I would definitely recommend it to others. I can add more to my review later after using it for 3 months. Part2: I started to experience little issue with my weight. I guess it can’t hold me may be. I did return the item.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Had bought another previous exactly the same model, but this was completely different to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: I am really unhappy about this purchase. I had bought a queen size same mattress months earlier and bought this one for a friend in full size. The firmness was not EVEN like the firmness on the other one, on either side of the flip mattress. Truly disappointed and actually upset as my friend is reporting worse back issues than on his old, beat up mattress we replaced.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: A huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Don't make the same mistake I made. I read the reviews and thought why not. I purchased this mattress for my RV. Unfortunately the return time frame ran out before our next trip. This is like sleeping on the floor. Very hard. Neither my wife or I can get comfortable on this mattress and if you like to sleep on your stomach with face close to mattress there is an obvious chemical smell over a month latter. You will spend 1 third of your life sleeping, don't make the mistake i made and go to a store and feel the mattress before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stone

customer_reviews.title: REVIEW MUNKIE. THE ONE REVIEW YOU NEED TO READ!
customer_reviews.text: What is this : it’s bloody lovely is what it is. We have a v expensive air mattress in our master and bought this for our guest bedroom. Honestly I’m considering swapping them over. Pros. Super super comfortable and COOL. Packaged well and expanded in 24 hours to full size. No noticeable smell that you sometimes get from foam mattresses. Zipper cover removal nice touch. Love the grey almost denim trim around the edge. Cons. None that I can find. Recommended ? Yes! Absolutely !
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: King size for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Slept on the matress for the first night after letting it air out for 2 days, the smell is still kind of strong but im hoping that will go away, the edges of the matress on the soft side seems to be too soft so it sinks downwards but maybe because its still taling form. Over all besides the smell (which i hope will go away) and the extra soft edges of the matress, its a pretty good matress for the price. Woke up feeling pretty well rested this morning. hopefully the little kinks go away( the smell and the edges being too soft) over time. Will update down the line after a couple of days
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mattress did have an odor for 2 days and I made sure I followed the directions opening it up and airing to it's full expansion. I'e had the mattress for more than 2 months now and every time I get into bed its like brand new, nice and firm and comfortable. I have arthritis in my back and hips and comfortable is important to me. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I had it for a month so far. Comfortable, well made. It is cooler then a regular non gel memory, but you can still feel heat your body produces. Because maybe I’m in the tropics, an this summer seems to be hotter then last. If you have A/C, then the heat your body produces from the memory won’t be a problem. Don’t put a bedbug encasement, your memory bed wont breath, making it hot hot hot. I am surprised on the quality of this produce. Maybe one day someone will make one with tiny fans built in to give us that extra coolness. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Nawahine4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love our new mattress. It is super stylish , looks great, but most important is how comfortable it is, it is the perfect combination of firmness while being conforming and soft. I am expecting a baby soon so I wanted something that is firm for now and later can be switched to soft, as it has two sides it is easily done. It also seems to help keep us cooler at night, definitely seems to not generate as much heat as our other mattress. I would highly recommend this mattress to anyone who is looking for the high quality mattress that is stylish and cool, and looks modern and clean. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Nehal Lakhani

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: After week try , this queen mattress impressed me alot .. because I had problem with sleep and every morning I get up my back feel painful. One of my friend notice my problem and recommend me to have this mattress cause she had it few year with it already.. The sweetnight really makes me a sweetnight, it had two sides which can be soft on one side and med firm on this other . Both sides are comfortable and I had a better sleep quality, few days later I realized that I didn't have back pain anymore since I use this mattress. I definitely like this and will recommend
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING VALUE & COMFY!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a good-quality mattress for our Guest Room's platform bed. This arrived in a box, complete with a little tool for cutting/removing the wrapper. Almost immediately, the thing began to re-inflate, and was ready for use in a couple of days (and NO odor either). There are 2 sides to this mattress: one Firm and one a softer Memory foam. We positioned the latter. It is extremely comfortable. In fact, if I was looking for a mattress for myself, THIS would be my choice. You can spend a LOT more money at other stores, but THIS one truly is a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: Cascade

customer_reviews.title: Medium firm, very soft not hard at all when you actually let in set in for a few night.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the company's advice to lay it out for a few hours before sleeping on it cause it arrived in a box. In my first few week, I jumped on the mattress up and down for like 5 mins cause it is a memory mattress. It only increases in softness when you make it soft, by either sleeping on it for a few time or jumping on it. The mattress was hard at first but later it get softer. That what she said.
customer_reviews.author: Kuchi Kopi

customer_reviews.title: It's like sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I really have nothing to say about this mattress. After removing it from the box, I left it for 72 hours, but the expansion speed was much faster than before. There is no bad smell. I think it's a bit soft, but it's comfortable-this comfort makes you don't want to get up in the morning. I sleep on my side and abdomen, which just fit my needs. Before deciding to buy this mattress, I have done a lot of research and I am happy to do it myself. Considering the price, you really can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing so far 👍
customer_reviews.text: This bed is pretty amazing. My fiance and I suffer from back problems but seem to wake up with less pain instead of more pain like we did with our old mattress. We currently use the soft side. The bed has a lot of space and is really comfortable. I'm giving it 5 stars as of now. The only issue I'm having is registering my warranty I've already tried doing this 4 times so far and it's simply not working unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McNeely

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable! My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son in a full. He had two twin beds that were brand new. I figured he could have an extra bed for sleepovers. What I hadn't thought about is that he went right from a crib into a full. I can't tell you how many times I found the kid hanging off his bed. So I decided to order this for him since I have a memory foam and so does his sister. He loves it! First night he slept til Noon. Lol! Very pleased with the quality and very well packed. Mine doesn't have a the cool feature a I am seriously considering getting one for me in a king.
customer_reviews.author: Abbykatesmom

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, good mattress for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was lacking. It arrived in a bag, rather than a box. I could see where the bag was torn away due to being dragged across the ground, however the plastic vacuum bag was thick enough to protect the mattress. Setup was easy, peel back the plastic, unroll (faint hissing from the mattress expanding), then cut the main vacuum bag. Fully inflated in a minute or two. Test of the mattress on the soft side, it seems very comfortable, contoured to my body both laying down and on side. I look forward to using it soon, after giving it time to fully expand.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress
customer_reviews.text: I buy this twin size 10 inches gel infused memory foam mattress for my son and it's a reversible mattress; the top side is soft and the bottom side is medium firm. This reversible memory foam mattress is rolled and compressed when it arrives. It is very easy to unpack and takes few hours to decompress/expand. My son sleeps on the medium firm side at night and he flip the soft side up as a sofa when he is awake. The mattress is plush and comfortable. My son loves this new mattress so much and it makes his sleep more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: black mold on mattress when opened
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the mattress and delivery was on time and everything but when we opened the product it had black marks spots on it, hoping it would be on the plastic but it ended up being on the mattress and it appears to be black mold. highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress!!!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress arrived two days earlier than expected. It is a lot heavier than my old mattress that it is replacing. I decided to use the softer side of the mattress, however both sides felt pretty comfortable. I decided on this mattress because they said that it does not use fiberglass. My dog thinks it is comfortable and was laying on the mattress instead of her own dog bed. The only thing that I dislike about new memory foam anything is the smell and offgasing. However they do say that it takes up to 72hours. I was impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: phonearoma

customer_reviews.title: Permanent indentions
customer_reviews.text: 8 months of use and it has already lost it's shape. There are permanent indentations from being laid on.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: got this mattress to replace my ten years old guest room mattress. I was deciding for two weeks if I buy it online or local store. And then I found it has Black Friday deal. So I bought it right away. As described, it come with a vacuum package. It fully expense after 3 days. I use the firm side. I like it when I lay down it. At first it do has smell. But after a few days, the smell go away. I had recommend to two friends for this mattress. It feels so good compare to the price you paid for. I really like how firm the mattress is.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Work Well
customer_reviews.text: After an endless search for reasonably priced custom cushions, I ended up buying of these. It came all rolled up in a box,Once the plastic was opened, the mattress instantly started to “swell”. I was truly amazed at not only how comfortable it was, but how well it fit. I will note that there was a strange odor that filled the room as the mattress was expanding. The next day, the mattress had fully fluffed out and was really nice!! It did take at least a few days for the odor to fully dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: Mina Y.

customer_reviews.title: Feels like sleeping on top the mattress not in
customer_reviews.text: This bed is comfortable. We use the soft side because the firm is too firm for us. Now, the soft side is actually not what you would think soft is, its better. Its soft but you don't sink into the mattress, you still feel like your on top the mattress. Overall, so far, I have all good things to say about this mattress, its comfortable and sleek. I will say it took a little while for the mattress to air out, but once that is done your good. We got this to replace our existing memory foam mattress and I got a say, this one is better than our old one when it was new.
customer_reviews.author: Obake

customer_reviews.title: So far so good three weeks in
customer_reviews.text: So far so good three weeks in. I tried both and settled on the firmer side. One star off for being made in China and a relatively short 30-day return. Compared to the competition, this is brief (many comparable manufacturers offer 60, 90, even 365 days! But this is the most economical. If I'd paid attention I might have bought a mattress made in the USA, but I believe that this is a good buy for the money. I hope it lasts a good ten years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Mo' lumpy mattress
customer_reviews.text: Never had a foam mattress before, and that's the first mattress I've ever gotten delivered. The package that came in was really neat, all solidly compressed and vacuum packed tight! So far the best way I can describe the mattress is very consistent. Compared to a traditional spring mattress it's very smooth and not lumpy in any place. It also doesn't seem to Sag at all in the middle like a normal mattress, which is definitely a plus as that's why I had to replace the old mattress. I am a side sleeper and it is about the perfect firmness for me, your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: jackson

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never slept better before even on more expensive mattresses!
customer_reviews.text: I’m still surprised what a good choice I made! First of all I wondered how in the world a king size mattress fitted into this box , it was really fun watching it unroll and expand. I never thought that for this money I’ll get such quality and comfort. Firm, supportive and a good balance between soft and firm! My dog jumped on it right away couldn’t get him out of bed since I bought it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: This may be the bed your looking for
customer_reviews.text: It is not a cheaply made bed and the shipping is amazing how small they get the mattress in the vac bag, best part about it. But it is neither the most comfortable or worst I have slept on. It was bought as a spare for guest who ended up staying over, for this it is perfect. I do not think more than 2 nights would be comfortable. I tried it on both the firm and soft side and you can feel the difference but both sides i woke with a slight sore back.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock
customer_reviews.text: There is absolutely no give to this mattress. If you like sleeping on a wooden plank, this is the one for you. And that’s on the “soft” side. I cannot imagine what the other side feels like. I give it three stars because my husband loves it for his lower back problems. I, however, am miserable. It hurts my shoulders like crazy when trying to sleep on my side. I wanted to love this mattress so much, but it’s been two weeks and no love :(
customer_reviews.author: Renee Chrisman

customer_reviews.title: Glad that I bought this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: The package was well packed. There was no damage when it arrived. However it's really heavy. I bought the king size one and I had two guys helping me to carry it upstairs. The mattress is comfortable. I was sleeping on the spring mattress and I didn't have any back pain before. However, this mattress definitely improved my sleep. I wears a smart watch when I sleep and I can see that my sleep actully is getting better after I sleep on this. I glad that I bought this mattress! I would recommend this mattress for someone who wants to try foam mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great comforting medium firm mattress for good sleep
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I was having pain with the one which I had like soar back. I am loving this mattress. Its really really good. I have used this on both side and its comfort on firm and soft side. I am currently using firm side as Its more of my choice but I like the soft side also. It came in very nice package and once i opened it took less than 1 hour for me to fully unpacked and fit perfectly in queen size bed. really nice material of cover also and no smell, literally no smell at all once its fully decompressed. Finally got the mattress which is very comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: KPate

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice mattress! I am currently in the process of my chronic back, neck, shoulder and hip pain. I could not get in a comfortable position on my back with my previous mattress. I am very comfortable on this in any position. My wife likes it,too.I am feeling better and better by the day. It's an impressive high-quality mattress at an equally impressive affordable price. Oh, the only negative thing I can think of, is the lingering air-out smell for the 1st few weeks. It says it's normal new smell...It recommends airing it out prior to use
customer_reviews.author: Kenken

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. I bought the first one a few months ago, highly recommend this mattress! Very good quality! First time I purchased full size for my older daughter, this time I purchased twin size for my younger daughter. They use bunk bed, it is perfect product for my kids use on bunk bed, when they walk on the mattress, the mattress didn’t shake at all, you may see my video. I like the white, soft and cool surface! It is really awesome product! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Finally was able to upgrade my bed to a memory foam mattress and I am a happy customer this bed is made from good quality material and I’ve been able to get better sleep without aches and pain and is just the right on how soft it is item was shipped quickly and received earlier then expected great service and great mattress it’s also has a zipper in the bottom of mattress where you can remove the cover to wash it which is awesome with kids definitely worth the price for a king size bed that I purchased will be buying same mattress for my kids aswell thank you
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and peaceful
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I bought this as it's a big investment. I was searching for a mattress which would provide me lumbar support. I was honestly surprised at the packaging as it looked normal size. The mattress started expanding as soon as I unboxed, and although it's mentioned that it would take about 72 hours to completely expand, it's ready to use within 2 hours. I can be used on both sides as it's flippable. It retains its original position even after multiple use. You will definitely need an alarm to wake up due to the peaceful sleep you'll have. Overall a great and budget friendly product.
customer_reviews.author: Nishanth Reddy Lakkadi

customer_reviews.title: Really good one
customer_reviews.text: Our previous mattress has been used over 10 years so we are thinking to change to a new one during holiday season, this one has promotion and reviews was really good. We got this one so quick and open it immediately (can’t to use it), the mattress stretch super fast. Two sides could be sleep, top is soft bottom is firm. We try bottom coz we are getting old, both of us are really satisfied and have good experiences. Just say again, it’s a really good mattress.
customer_reviews.author: AnGi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable queen mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable queen mattress, I would say it's medium firm, maybe towards a bit firm. This can be hard for some people. so someone might need to try it before purchase. The packaging is very small, yet heavy. It took sometime for me to bring it in and unpack it. After unpacking the mattress, I just let it out for about two days in the garage so it will fully inflate. The sleep quality on this mattress is nice, with memory foam, it will fully adopt to my body. Also, there is no weird smell that sometimes will come with the memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Comfort level up!
customer_reviews.text: This was well worth the purchase. I bought this mattress as my old one was to the point where I wasn’t getting a good nights sleep. Not knowing how this one would be I bought it based on the reviews, and I was not disappointed. The mattress itself is super soft and yet sturdy enough to support my aching back. I think the comfort level of this mattress is 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Bunki

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but so worth the price
customer_reviews.text: On one hand, the people saying it's "like sleeping on a cloud" are absolutely full of it. Even the "soft" side is medium-firm. On the other hand, after a few weeks of adjusting, this is the most comfortable bed I've ever owned. I've had chronic back problems for years, and muscle pain in my chest for the last few years, but this bed is doing wonders for them both. I highly recommend it! For what it's worth, claims that the bed "sleeps cool" are also greatly exaggerated, which is why this is a 4 star rating. All foam mattresses sleep warm, which I'm fine with; I'm not fine with being lied to about it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on purchasing the memory foam mattress from a company I have not heard from but I was very wrong! I had a queen size ghost bed and the price of the King on here convinced me to give it a try.... WOW, I was shocked when the bed was just as comfy, if not more comfy than my ghost bed mattress. I am sleeping well and both me and my wife love the extra room we have. This was an amazing upgrade and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ken L

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy. I looked at reviews for several mattresses. I was looking for something less firm. This Sweetnight mattress is the one. It has a softer side and a firmer side, depending on what you like. The box it came in was surprisingly small and easy to move. I carefully opened the package and threw it on the box spring. The mattress was in sleep ready shape in less than 1 day. I would recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G Schager

customer_reviews.title: A great mattress for good night sleep
customer_reviews.text: I bought this memory foam mattress because my previous bed was 8 years old and really need to be trashed. I'm really impressed when it arrived as a huge box, the setup was like a breeze, the entire king mattress was compressed and packaged in a tall box. I got a perfect night sleep first night on it and both my wife and I love it! The foam mattress was thick and provided perfect balance to support the body, I couldn't feel her move when she sleep next to me. My back felt great the next morning. It has just enough memory, but not sink in. All in all, Great quality especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: I brought this full size mattress for my little Daughter.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this full size mattress for my little daughter. My daughter loves it very much. She also says it sleeps well. She had a expensive spring mattress that didn’t last more than a year before it became lumpy and sagging were she sleep. When I saw this foam mattress and the great price I decided to try it. It is the most comfortable mattress. It was easy to lay out to regain its shape and is a great thickness. My daughter loves the foam instead of springs. So glad I decided to try it out! Great price, Great product, Highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Firm!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress to replace the old spring mattress. I had back pain on the old mattress. I'm glad that I got this one. This mattress can be used either side, one side is softer and one side is firm. It has much more support than my old one. The packing is very good. It also includes a pouch with a notebook and instructions inside. It also include a envelope cutter which can be used to cut the plastic wrappers to avoid damaging the mattress. Very considerate! Now after two weeks of sleeping on this mattress, I no longer feel back pain in the morning! Like it! Good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE & EXCELLENT QUALITY MATTRESS
customer_reviews.text: I bought a full size mattress (expensive by the way) 3 months ago for my son but he said that the mattress is uncomfortable to sleep for that reason I fund and choose this mattress that is very nice, soft and extremely comfortable, now my son really enjoys sleeping in his bed, also you can choose the firm side or the soft side. The delivery was very fast and it came with a nice packaging and sealed with a vacuum bag which made it easy to move and set up. I am very happy and satisfied with this purchase so I personally recommend this product, as well as the great value of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 10" queen for my daughter and she loved it. One side is very firm and the other side is softer. The very firm side is good for people with lower back pain. My daughter has back pain so she prefers the firm side. Overall, this is a great matress and I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shinamoo

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am looking for a memory mattress, which is undoubtedly my ideal memory mattress. Because it is moderate hardness and comfortable. My husband and I have symptoms of back muscle ache. So I want to use memory mattress instead of ordinary mattress. This memory mattress is very good, it will not bring pressure to the back. It is comfortable to lie down and can support my body. I didn't expect it to work so well. It can relieve my back effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something with a gel memory foam and a very comfortable mattress and I've had a couple of them and I'm not satisfied until I find this.it has two different kinds gel memory foam and high density supportive foam.i use the gel memory foam side it is very soft and comfortable,I've been sleeping pretty well since I got this.And the most important thing is that it's not the same on either side so sometimes if you want to get a harder one you just turn it over.great mattress I have ever had
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Yeah you should but this one
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect. The first night we slept on the firm side then flipped it to the softer side - goldilocks likes! I was SOOO worried it wouldn't work out because the original mattress we bought (12in ashley chime) was very highly rated and cheaper but WAY TOO FIRM. like rock hard. Thanks Amazon for allowing us to return it! This one is a dream to sleep on. I don't wake up sore and i sleep all night, what more can you want?
customer_reviews.author: NWY

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, like packaging
customer_reviews.text: I need a big mattress, this size is what I need . When it arrives, I don't believe that the king size mattress has only a medium box , the mattress is compressed and neat , when I opened and placed for half a day it was fully executed, no odor for it. When I sleep, I can roll around. The mattress is a medium firm, which will not collapse when lying on it,but it can support my body and waist . It is very comfortable, it allows me to sleep better this week.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Solve my sleep problem
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by brother-in-law to me. Because he knows how hard to get a perfet matress to fit me. My wife and I both work in a restaurant. Every day long-time standing(over 10 hours)causes us back pain problem. So we really need a firm matress like this Sweetnight design ensures maximum comfort and plenty of back support. We have this matress almost three months. So far so good. It solves my sleep problem. Also this matress is compressed, rolled and shipped conveniently in a box to our door. It is very easy to set up and expand with its opener. My wife and I really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy1981

customer_reviews.title: So so so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am so so so glad I purchased this mattress. I’m no newby to “bed in a box”. I’ve ordered a different mattres from Amazon before and I can’t believe I slept omg that EXTRMELY FIRM AND UNCOMFORTABLE mattress for that long. The price for this mattress is incredible. This could easily go for $600+ so I’m not sure how I was able to snag it for less than $400. Super glad I upgraded to a queen. Will never buy a full again.
customer_reviews.author: SleepySloth

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable despite me preffering firm beds. Smell never goes away though.
customer_reviews.text: I am 200+ lbs somewhat athletic build, the lady is much lighter and shorter. I usually love the firm side of beds, but this one keeps us both asleep at night. I have never been a side sleeper until I got this mattress and now I can actually do it! Speaking of that, the mattress is very stable if you catch my drift. BUT... the plastic smell even after months with an air purifier has not gone away!
customer_reviews.author: QuattroStig

customer_reviews.title: My back and hips don't hurt when I wake up now!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is amazing. Make sure you use the little tool for opening the plastic around the mattress. It made it so easy. It comes all rolled up and compressed quite thin. It doesn't seem like there is any way possible it will expand to be 10" thick, but I went back into the room 10 hours later and there is was fully expanded. It is soft, but firm enough and provides excellent support. My back and hips don't hurt when I wake up now!
customer_reviews.author: MamaD

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is very smart. I live on the second floor. Our aisle is very small. The mattress I bought before is difficult to move, but this time the product is designed very well and can be moved easily. And its hardness is just right, it can support my waist, shoulders and neck very well. I am a chef, and I often get backache when I go home from get off work at night. This mattress is so helpful to me, I recommend it to Colleagues in our restaurant. After more than a week of use, it feels good, and the mattress is also very breathable and not stuffy.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: best mattress that I've ever purchased through Online!
customer_reviews.text: this is the BEST mattress that I've ever purchased through online! this 10 inches memory firm is actually NOT soft at all. at first, I've purchase this mattress just to put in the guest room as a spare mattress. when the first night that I've tried this, I have now actually moved it into my master room! I've paid over thousands bucks on the memory firms. I honestly LOVE this one. now, I will need to return back purchase a full size for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Jay-Z

customer_reviews.title: My parents love their new mattress
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. After buying my first pillow from Sweetnight, I fell in love with the brand. My mom recently got a king sized bed frame and was searching for a mattress, I recommended for her to try a sweet night mattress and she loves it! She said it’s more comfortable than her previous mattress and there’s a soft side and harder side which is adjustable to tailor to the liking of the user.
customer_reviews.author: Tang

customer_reviews.title: 5star comfort mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress! This gel memory foam hybrid mattress is so comfortable. I have never bought a mattress online because I don’t believe the quality. However, I was wrong about it. This can be comparable to those big brands like Nectar or Layla. I got a full size foam mattress and it is medium soft which what I need. I used to wake up in the morning with severe backache because of my old mattress. I changed to this new one and felt so much better. Trust me on this one, this is so nice!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Reversible, firm and soft. Great sleep quality.
customer_reviews.text: Came in a box and roll couple days to expand fully 10inches. Can be used both sides. Firm on one side and soft on the other. I’m using the soft side. Comfort levels are great on both firm and soft sides. Great sleep quality on the soft side, I’m yet to try a full night sleep ok the firm side. The soft side is very relaxing and relief for my back pain. Over all a good mattress and totally loving the product.
customer_reviews.author: SP

product_meta.title: Sweetnight Queen Mattress-Queen Size Mattress,10 Inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress for Back Pain Relief /Motion Isolation & Cool Sleep, Flippable Comfort from Soft to Medium Firm,Sunkiss
product_meta.description:
Size:Queen
Sweetnight mattress in a box, smartly shipped to your door for easy set up.
NO RISK WARRANTY
- We as the maker, guarantee the fair price mattress you can get. Our bed mattresses come with 10 years warranty.
- Over 96% of our customers keep their mattresses and refer it to others.
- 24/7 email support. If for any reason you are unsatisfied, contact us at any time.

About Sweetnight Mattresses
We know how hard it is to find the perfect mattress that just fits. We believe everyone should sleep well and feel refreshed after a night of rest. 
After over 10,000 users experience, feedback, studies people, bodies, countless material testing … We have created this patented bed mattress just for you!

What makes Sweetnight Foam Mattress so different? 
- Top & Bottom, both sides could be slept on
- Normally, we recommend sleeping on the top side of this mattress, as it feels like sleeping on the cloud.
- You can also relax on the bottom (the zipper side) too, exclusively designed for lovers of firm support and feeling. Prevents back pain.

Made for different body weights and sleeping positions. 
Whether you are side-sleeper, back-sleeper, stomach-sleeper or you are with a partner, light or heavy weight. You get adequate support from a 10 inches memory foam mattress, which helps you avoid tossing and turning at night.

What is in the box? 
1x Sweetnight gel foam mattress
1x night sleep opener 
1x manual & warranty card

Note: 
- To guarantee your warranty remains valid, please follow the guides in the manual accordingly.
- Endeavour to open your mattress package within 72 hours of receipt and allow 72 hours for your new mattress to return to its original, plush shape.
feature_bullets: FLIPPABLE QUEEN MATTRESSES -- Sweet night Queen size mattress is designed to be flippable with unique 4 layered & zoned foam design. Allow you to sleep on either side. Its like having 2 in 1. 2 inch of gel infused memory foam on the top keeps you cool, followed by 5 inch of comfort foam, pressure points & keep body balanced. 3 inch of high-density support foam on the bottom for durability and performance, strengthens edge-to-edge support, resists sagging and roll-off.

BACK PAIN RELIEF & MOTION ISOLATION -- the mattress queen size features a plush, soft surface that leaves you floating on a cloud, while the bottom offers medium Queen firm mattress support. Perfectly contour your body. Say goodbye to back pain. Plus the Queen memory foam mattress eliminates motion transfer, controls motion to prevent localized bounce, so you can sleep through your partner’s tossing and turning and wake up refreshed. The Queen bed mattress is great for all sleeping positions.

HEALTH &MATTRESSES QUEEN -- certipur-us certified foam made without harmful substances like formaldehyde, Mercury, or other heavy metals. The foam mattress's cover is made with breathable Rayon cotton fabric, naturally prevents the growth of stain and odor causing Mold and mildew. As with most new purchases, any “new product smell” that you may experience is harmless and will dissipate in few days. Enjoy healthier sleep with this memory foam mattress Queen.

SUPER-EASY DELIVERY SOLUTION & MATTRESS IN A BOX -- our memory foam queen mattress is compressed and boxed, not only saving on shipping but making it much more manageable once it Arrives at your home. Easy to move through narrow hallways and staircases. Fits all frames, such as box spring, adjustable and slatted base, even hospital bed. Choose one comfort to your liking with the sweetnight mattress.

10 YEARS NO RISK PROMISE & BEST FAIR MATTRESS -- with our exceptional, we have you covered. Our cooling mattress offers durability, performance, and peace of mind. Thanks to a 10-year limited. We offer 24/7 service. You can contact us any time for support. We recommend sleeping on it for a few weeks in order to give your mattress a chance to “break-in” to the way you sleep.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,267 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
